alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 9:08AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Across Lake and Inland Volusia Counties... At 908 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery and traffic cameras showed patchy dense fog developing across Lake and Inland Volusia Counties. The fog was reducing visibilities to a quarter of a mile or less. The fog is expected to burn off by around 10 AM. Drivers should prepare to encounter rapid visibility reductions early this morning, especially as the morning rush hour commute approaches. Consider leaving early so that you can arrive safely at your destination at a safe driving speed. When driving in fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
